header.title: Use as you want. Pay as you go.

saveMoney.hint: Performance is based on independent real-world user data provided by CDNPerf and pricing from the public provider listing on July 2022.

header.title: Fully flexible pay as you go CDN pricing
header.content: Choose between two simple pricing plans designed for any budget. Scale from a few gigabytes to hundreds of petabytes per month.

content.title: Always on hand
